sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategory</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>This script bulk updates the Full Category Names for each category based on the related category labels based on locale.</description> <name>UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategory</name> <script><![CDATA[var UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategory = Class.create(); UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategory.prototype = Object.extendsObject(UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategorySNC,{ type: 'UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategory' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-03-08 22:15:05</sys_created_on> <sys_id>03ba95e15b0212007223286411f91ad2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UpdateAllKnowledgeFullCategory</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management Core" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">e011410f6d2620100acb70b353433002</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_03ba95e15b0212007223286411f91ad2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-12-17 09:07:29</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>219</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
